positions.schema:
CREATE TABLE positions (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                engine TEXT NOT NULL,
                symbol TEXT NOT NULL,
                side TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'flat',
                size REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
                entry_price REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
                current_price REAL DEFAULT 0,
                unrealized_pnl REAL DEFAULT 0,
                leverage REAL DEFAULT 1.0,
                opened_at REAL NOT NULL,
                updated_at REAL NOT NULL,
                metadata TEXT DEFAULT '{}',
                UNIQUE(engine, symbol)
            )

trades.schema:
CREATE TABLE trades (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                engine TEXT NOT NULL,
                symbol TEXT NOT NULL,
                side TEXT NOT NULL,
                size REAL NOT NULL,
                price REAL NOT NULL,
                fee REAL DEFAULT 0,
                status TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
                order_id TEXT,
                tx_signature TEXT,
                realized_pnl REAL DEFAULT 0,
                created_at REAL NOT NULL,
                executed_at REAL,
                metadata TEXT DEFAULT '{}'
            )

signals.schema:
CREATE TABLE signals (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                engine TEXT NOT NULL,
                signal_type TEXT NOT NULL,
                symbol TEXT,
                direction TEXT,
                confidence REAL,
                reason TEXT,
                created_at REAL NOT NULL,
                metadata TEXT DEFAULT '{}'
            )

engine_snapshots.schema:
CREATE TABLE engine_snapshots (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                engine TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
                status TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'stopped',
                config TEXT DEFAULT '{}',
                state TEXT DEFAULT '{}',
                created_at REAL NOT NULL
            )

paper_wallet.schema:
CREATE TABLE paper_wallet (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                asset TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
                balance REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
                initial_balance REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
                updated_at REAL NOT NULL
            )

paper_trades.schema:
CREATE TABLE paper_trades (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                engine TEXT NOT NULL,
                symbol TEXT NOT NULL,
                side TEXT NOT NULL,
                size REAL NOT NULL,
                entry_price REAL NOT NULL,
                exit_price REAL,
                fee REAL DEFAULT 0,
                realized_pnl REAL DEFAULT 0,
                status TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'open',
                opened_at REAL NOT NULL,
                closed_at REAL,
                metadata TEXT DEFAULT '{}'
            )

paper_positions.schema:
CREATE TABLE paper_positions (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                engine TEXT NOT NULL,
                symbol TEXT NOT NULL,
                side TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'flat',
                size REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
                entry_price REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
                current_price REAL DEFAULT 0,
                unrealized_pnl REAL DEFAULT 0,
                leverage REAL DEFAULT 1.0,
                opened_at REAL NOT NULL,
                updated_at REAL NOT NULL,
                UNIQUE(engine, symbol)
            )

engine_vaults.schema:
CREATE TABLE engine_vaults (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                engine TEXT NOT NULL,
                asset TEXT NOT NULL,
                balance REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
                initial_balance REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
                updated_at REAL NOT NULL,
                UNIQUE(engine, asset)
            )
